attributes.title: Crypto Technology
attributes.description: A visualisation the current state of technology involved with cryptocurrencies using the hype cycle. See also our [Crypto Hype Cycle](/t/crypto-market). These are not specific to a single project.

items.title: Blockchain
items.description: The blockchain is at the core of cryptocurrencies. In short it represents a public ledger of who owns what.

items.title: Tokens (Ethereum
items.description:
Ethereum based tokens go by the ERC-20 standard, and allow third parties to launch custom tokens on top of the Ethereum network.

For technical details: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-20.md

items.title: Tokens (Stellar)
items.description:
Stellar tokens, also known as assets, are custom tokens utilized within the Stellar network.

https://www.stellar.org/developers/guides/issuing-assets.html

items.title: Smart Contracts
items.description: Smart Contracts is code that is executed on the blockchain network. Several coins allow smart contracts. Differences between them is based on contract code language, speed and costs.

items.title: dApps
items.description:
dApps is short for decentralized apps. It allows programs to execute code on the blockchain network.

An overiew: https://www.stateofthedapps.com/

items.title: Lightning Network
items.description:
The lightning network is a protocol on top of the blockchain, allowing instant transactions over a payment channel.

* https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lightning_Network

states.label: Innovation trigger
states.description: A potential technology breakthrough kicks things off.

states.label: Peak expectation
states.description: Early publicity produces a number of success stories â€” often accompanied by scores of failures.

states.label: Disillusionment
states.description: Interest wanes as experiments and implementations fail to deliver. Producers of the technology shake out or fail.

states.label: Enlightenment
states.description: More instances of how the technology can benefit the market start to crystallize.

states.label: Productivity plateau
states.description: Mainstream adoption starts to take off. The technology's broad market applicability and relevance are clearly paying off.
